Hi all — really looking for some help here and almost at my wit’s end :sweat_smile: I’m a marketing person not a dev, so please excuse ambiguities in my briefing of the issue we’re facing:

• We collect user actions in our product via Segment
• Segment formats the data and we currently send it to trigger workflows in Intercom/Mixpanel/GA/Customer.io, etc
• I want to do the same in HubSpot. I want customer actions (enabled/disabled feature XYZ for example) to update Contact/Deal properties in HubSpot, which will then enroll contacts into Workflows
In discussing with HS support, they’ve sent me this <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/v2/update_contact_property> which would involve changing all of our segment events with these calls. This isn’t feasible.

Does anyone have any experience here, or could assist? It would be so appreciated :pray:
